backhand_footwork.probleme: Players often neglect backhand footwork drills
causes_communes: Coaches and players focus on forehand development
Many forehand footwork drills incorporate backhands, but only cover moving from the forehand side to the backhand side
Intermediate players are developing their forehand and backhand topspin shots separately
Players have developed a solid topspin backhand and don't see the need for backhand footwork drills

debutant: Learn to move side to side as well as in and out
Practice backhands with your coach or partner attacking randomly to your backhand

exercices_complementaires.description: Play aggressive backhands and learn to topspin from off the table.

metriques_progression: Learn to topspin both side-to-side and in-and-out backhand footwork
